At [HOST4FUN.COM ](https://www.host4fun.com/)we offer cheap and budget web hosting and VPS services.We are legally registered company under QuadSpark IT Solutions Private Limited.  

We offer KVM and OpenVZ Virtual Machine from different locations across globe.

Today we are sharing our Singapore Location Offer.

Our Singapore Location comes with Enterprise Grade SSD Storage , Free 20Gbps DDoS Protection.1Gbps Port Speed & great connectivity to Asian countries .  
Our Singapore Nodes are Hosted in Equinix Singapore SG3.  

**2GB RAM SSD KVM VPS (Singapore)**  
2GB Ram  
2xCPU Core (Shared)   
25GB SSD Storage  
500GB Bandwidth  
1Gbps Port Speed !  
20Gbps DDoS Protection  
Intel Xeon CPU  
1 Free IP  
Linux OS  
Windows Server Trial OS (2008 or 2012 R2)  
Price : $7/months
